column4: Everytime I reboot I have to reinstall my nvidia driver from the script downloaded from NVIDIA?  Anyone ever have this problem?  I install the nvidia driver after rebooting and it works fine.  Until I install it, X fails to start with a "Failed to initialize the NVIDIA kernel module!" error.
i tried over and over and failed until i used Envy, then it finally installed
It installs fine each time and starts up fine each time.  Its just when I rebot it does weird stuff.
